A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: ABSOLUTELY HATED IT. I was born in 1977\, I grew up in the star wars fanclub\, I love STAR WARS. LOVE IT. They had Luke\, our childhood hero\, STROKE OUT\, fine he became 1 with the force\, but stroked out come on. Now if Ben Solo dies\, the skywalker line is gone\, come on. Disney have failed us horribly\, horribly. I am very upset at them. I mean\, just have all the originals die in the crawl\, instead of ruining their stories. Reys parents aren't leia\, they aren't luke\, she isn't a skywalker\, how stupid\, being so scared of repeating yourself that you hurt the story is just if not worse.
